name: Pipo (mwr.giannini)
description:
A 2D platformer prototype made for our Intro to Game Development course.

Thank you to these creators for sharing their assets on itch.io: 

9E0 for the player sprite,  Cainos for the level tilesets,  antrixglow98 for the fear bar,  and Pipoya for the victory portal.  

Footsteps and collection sounds are from the Unity platformer tutorial. 

Music and fear sound effect are original.
